item.description:
A delightful Meeting was held with Brother Charles  original Founder and Radio personality of TOUCH 106.1 FM

If you recall Brother Charles was the infamous DJ at Joni Spicer's 60th  Birthday Party

TOSOB members are invited as VIP guest to showcase Stepping at Brother Charle's 50th Birthday Party

This will also be a networking opportunity and TOSOB would like to arrange a PR table

Please RSVP and email touchfmradio@yahoo.com to confirm your invitation on the VIP list for TOSOB

TOUCH 106.1 is a community-based radio station catering to the broadcast needs of the neighborhoods in the immediate broadcast area.

 TOUCH 106.1 FM was founded in 2005.

The Black community's voice was silenced by the sale of long-standing heritage radio station, WILD.
Attire: Dress for a  Steppers Set

REMEMBER: You must e mail touchfmradio@yahoo.com
item.how_to_find_us: The Original Steppers of Boston 2006 inc.

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Another Steppin Opportunity
